revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LevelOne |model=WBR-3408 |revision=v2 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=WBR-3408 |default_ssid_regex=^WBR-3408$ |default_ch= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }}Per [http://download.level1.com/level1/member/marketingdocument/Broadband_and_ADSL_Router_Comparison_Table.xls LevelOne's comparison table], this is Broadcom 5354 based.
The device appears to be similar to the [[SerComm IP806BB]] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=92052].
